001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.standalone_price.StandalonePrice;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.standalone_price.StandalonePriceDraft;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.standalone_price.StandalonePriceDraftBuilder;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.standalone_price.StandalonePriceUpdate;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.standalone_price.StandalonePriceUpdateAction;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.standalone_price.StandalonePriceUpdateActionBuilder;
014
015public interface ByProjectKeyStandalonePricesRequestBuilderMixin {
016    public ByProjectKeyStandalonePricesPost post(StandalonePriceDraft standalonePriceDraft);
017
018    public ByProjectKeyStandalonePricesByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
019
020    public default ByProjectKeyStandalonePricesByIDPost update(Versioned<StandalonePrice> standalonePrice,
021            List<StandalonePriceUpdateAction> actions) {
022        return withId(standalonePrice.getId()).post(
023            builder -> StandalonePriceUpdate.builder().version(standalonePrice.getVersion()).actions(actions));
024    }
025
026    public default ByProjectKeyStandalonePricesByIDPost update(Versioned<StandalonePrice> standalonePrice,
027            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<StandalonePriceUpdateAction, StandalonePriceUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
028        return withId(standalonePrice.getId()).post(builder -> StandalonePriceUpdate.builder()
029                .version(standalonePrice.getVersion())
030                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(StandalonePriceUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
031    }
032
033    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<StandalonePriceUpdateAction, StandalonePriceUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyStandalonePricesByIDPost> update(
034            Versioned<StandalonePrice> standalonePrice) {
035        return builder -> withId(standalonePrice.getId()).post(b -> StandalonePriceUpdate.builder()
036                .version(standalonePrice.getVersion())
037                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(StandalonePriceUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
038    }
039
040    public default ByProjectKeyStandalonePricesByIDDelete delete(Versioned<StandalonePrice> standalonePrice) {
041        return withId(standalonePrice.getId()).delete().withVersion(standalonePrice.getVersion());
042    }
043
044    public default ByProjectKeyStandalonePricesPost create(StandalonePriceDraft standalonePriceDraft) {
045        return post(standalonePriceDraft);
046    }
047
048    public default ByProjectKeyStandalonePricesPost create(UnaryOperator<StandalonePriceDraftBuilder> op) {
049        return post(op.apply(StandalonePriceDraftBuilder.of()).build());
050    }
051
052}
